description: Welcome to the course on "Workshop in Probability and Statistics from Start to Finish"Â This workshop is designed to help you make sense of basic probability and statistics with easy-to-understand explanations of all the subject's most important concepts. Whether you are starting from scratch or if you are in a statistics class and struggling with your assigned textbook or lecture material, this workshop was built with you in mind. In this workshop you will learn about Probability , Hypothesis Testing , Confidence Interval , Simple and Linear Regression Models , Sampling or survey sampling with complete Exercises , and PDF materials also provided for additional help .
title: Workshop in Probability and Statistics from Start to Finish
